attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we have to wait for between 3 and 4 months for a diagnostic ultra sound scan?  When you are feeling really ill you need to know what is wrong much quicker than that so you can get urgent treatment.

rejection.details: The main sentence requires an action of HM Government. Please ammend.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
